node.title: Kiwi teen tipped for basketball future stardom after moving to US
node.description: Jackson Kiss, 14, is turning the right heads after his move abroad.
node.content: ["One year ago he was at school on a rugby scholarship, now Kiwi Jackson Kiss is one of the biggest names in grassroots basketball in America.", "Fourteen-year-old Kiss may not have taken a traditional path, but a top high school coach in the US is predicting a massive future on the horizon.", "Kiss went to the US with former Tall Blacks and Auckland City coach Lindsay Tait to help continue his career that only began two years ago, when the pair first met.", "\"I invited Jackson along, that's club basketball - it's for everybody,\" Tait tells Newshub.", "\"We [were] basically teaching the fundamentals of the game, and he's never left.\"", "Kiss was invited to play in the Amateur Athletic Union circuit, one of the most competitive junior leagues in the US.\u00a0", "\"I honestly call it a dream,\" Kiss tells Newshub. \"[I] couldn't believe I'd be here.\"", "And it was there, playing for Team Melo backed by NBA superstar Carmelo Anthony, where he was coached by Sam Brand, who was immediately taken back by the Kiwi kid.\u00a0", "\"From the very beginning, I knew there was potential,\" Brand says. \"From my first day in the gym with him.\"", "For the 14-year-old, it's been a trip he will never forget.\u00a0", "\"This experience has been [an] amazing, amazing eye-opener for me,\" he adds.", "And he's certainly left his mark.", "\"Jackson Kiss now has a significant buzz in the grassroots basketball world over here,\" adds Brand.\u00a0", "\"I have plenty of contacts in the high school basketballing world, and all of them have reached out to me about Jackson.\"", "And Brand believes he can turn that buzz into a future.", "\"There is no ceiling for what Jackson Kiss can do in the game of basketball.\"", "Jackson Kiss - a name to remember as he paves his own path in the basketball world."]
